pr_title: IGNITE-13075 NPE on request JDBC metadata.

timeline.message: IGNITE-13075 NPE on request JDBC metadata

timeline.bodyText:
It is not correct javadoc "list", it should be written in HTML style like
  • ....
So, it is a test though... who cares.
timeline.author: AMashenkov

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/modules/clients/src/test/java/org/apache/ignite/jdbc/thin/JdbcThinMetadataSelfTest.java b/modules/clients/src/test/java/org/apache/ignite/jdbc/thin/JdbcThinMetadataSelfTest.java index 63db2f5c48..a2c1effec0 100644 --- a/modules/clients/src/test/java/org/apache/ignite/jdbc/thin/JdbcThinMetadataSelfTest.java +++ b/modules/clients/src/test/java/org/apache/ignite/jdbc/thin/JdbcThinMetadataSelfTest.java @@ -207,10 +207,11 @@ public class JdbcThinMetadataSelfTest extends JdbcThinAbstractSelfTest { } /** - * Ensure metadata returned for cache without explicit query entities: - * - create a cache with indexed types and without explicit query entities - * - request metadata for columns from the cache - * - verify returned result + * Ensure metadata returned for cache without explicit query entities:
    + *
  • create a cache with indexed types and without explicit query entities
    • + *
  • request metadata for columns from the cache
    • + *
  • verify returned result
    • + *
* * @throws SQLException */

timeline.author: AMashenkov
